inventory.commentary: 15sep06 update to WN2.1, added features, examples. ahouston

sense.name: business
sense.commentary: CORPORATION[+entity][+organization][+business][+legally_defined] a business firm whose articles of incorporation have been approved in some state
sense.examples: I've invested in a large profitable corporation. These corporations are publicly traded on the NYSE. He started his own corporation a few years ago and now he is rich.

sense.name: potbelly, paunch
sense.commentary: CORPORATION[+entity][+structure][+anatomical][+belly][+large] pot, potbelly, bay window, tummy - humorous slang term for a paunch
sense.examples: His corporation was hanging over his pants. All that beer has helped George to develop a corporation.
